column1: * 1925 - Voice actor Wolfe Morris is born.
* 1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Madam Ossendrijver (5 January 1961).
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Joy Hill (5 January 1967).
* 1989 - The Return of the Shadow is published in the US.
* 1998 - Roverandom is published in the UK.
* 2004 - Graphic novel Heavens War is published.
* 2008 - http://entertainment.timesonline.co.uk/tol/arts_and_entertainment/books/article3127837.ece The Times ranks J.R.R. Tolkien the sixth-best post-war British writer.
